name: Caballo Mortal
description:
Caballo Mortal is a short game made in under 2 days for #gdugamejam1

The game takes place in medieval Spain. You play as a knight who has been badly injured and rendered unconscious in a freak accident involving a horse carriage. Drawing closer and closer to death, you must find a way to unlock the door to life, wake yourself up, and survive the incident.

The controls are fully customizable, and the game can be played with a gamepad with inverted Y-Axis.
